No nonsense, Electromatic hollowbody guitars are the perfect real, pure and powerful Gretsch instruments. They’re your next-step Gretsch—bold, dynamic and articulate, and crafted with the essential Gretsch sound, style and playability.Sleek yet aggressive, the G5422TG has a thinner, hollow build with a true Filter’Tron voice that captures the resonant hollow-body sound with a more present voice. Like all Electromatic guitars, it delivers the authenticity that has set Gretsch apart as the quintessential rock ‘n’ roll guitars from the very beginning.
